comments.content: shouldn't this be the job of an upstream web server? I prefer to put nginx in front of applications to deal with these issues.

comments.content:
Yep, I imagine this will be closed as a no-op once we have defined who is
doing the compression for us.  I just added the bug so we wouldn't forget it
(since the current API spec supports this.) - Michael
